description:
Bowser (known as Koopa in Japan) is the main antagonist of the Super Mario series. He is the King of the Koopas, one of the races that live in the Mushroom World. He is always trying to capture Princess Peach, the Princess of the Mushroom Kingdom, but his plans are frustrated by Mario and Luigi.
As time went on, Bowser started to partake in Kart races, sport competitions and parties with the rest of the Super Mario cast, and sometimes ha has even worked with the heroes to defeat common enemies.
name: Bowser

description:
Rosalina first showed up in Super Mario Galaxy, in the Comet Observatory. She watches over  the cosmos like a guardian, and is also the adoptive mother to the Lumas, the star-like little creatures that resides in the universe. Bowser was the one who attacked the observatory and sent it drifting into space without any power. When Mario and Rosalina met, they decided to help each other out. Rosalina promised to help Mario save Princess Peach if Mario in return could gather Power Stars in order to get the power back. 

At first, people thought that Rosalina and Princess Peach were related, and they did take that into consideration at first, but finally took another route in the end, making her another princess-like character in the Mario world.

Many gamers started to like Rosalina and her wise, kind and thoughtful personality. That's why the creators decided to include her as a playable character in future games. You can play as her in the Mario Kart series, Super Smash Bros, as well as in Super Mario 3D World.
name: Rosalina

description: Funtime Freddy is a major antagonist who first appeared in Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location as the titular, secondary antagonist. He is a circus-themed version of Freddy Fazbear. He is also one of the entertainers from the Funtime Auditorium, which is located from the east of Circus Baby's Entertainment and Rental (although he isn't seen in the said auditorium).
name: Funtime Freddy

description:
Circus Baby (commonly referred to as Baby) is the secondary antagonist of the Five Nights at Freddy’s series and the animatronic mascot of Circus Baby's Pizza World invented by Afton Robotics, LLC and made for Fazbear Entertainment, Inc.

Baby is haunted by the soul of Elizabeth Afton, who was the daughter of the serial killer William Afton. However, during the completion ending, Elizabeth's soul was presumably set free.
name: Circus Baby

akas: ドクター・エッグマン
description:
The character Doctor Ivo "Eggman" Robotnik is the man antagonist of the Sonic the Hedgehog franchise, created by Sega. Being a mad scientist, he constantly plans to conquer the world in order to fulfill his dream: to build his own Eggman Empire. He's the archenemy of Sonic, and wants to do everything in his power to stand as the last winner. Spme of Eggman's basic characteristics is his egg-shaped body, his sunglasses, his clothing in red, black and yellow, as well as his very large mustache.

Outside of appearing in almost every Sonic the Hedgehog video game, he's also a recurring character in other media such as comics, animations and novels.

Eggman loves machines and is often described as a genius with an IQ of 300. He doesn't care for others' opinions and never gives up on his desire to build the ultimate "utopia". Whoever interrupt his plans, becomes a prime threat and a target. Although Sonic has always ruined his evil plans, Eggman holds a secret respect for his determination.

Many of the robots in the earlier games are actually animals that Robotnik trapped in mechanical outfits. These are the same animals that Sonic frees at the end of each level.
name: Dr. Eggman

description: Sonic The Hedgehog, or simply Sonic, is the main protagonist of the Sonic series, starting in Sonic The Hedgehog for the Sega Genesis. He is a blue hedgehog that can run at incredible speed, being also known as "The Blue Blur" because of that. He always acts in a cool manner.
name: Sonic the Hedgehog

description: Makoto Niijima is a playable character in Persona 5. She's the student council president of Shujin Academy who lives a double life as a Phantom Thief.
name: Makoto Niijima

description: Lysithea is a playable character in Fire Emblem: Three Houses. She is a student at the Officers Academy who is from the Leicester Alliance and is a member of the Golden Deer.
name: Lysithea von Ordelia

description: Sylvain is a playable character that appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses. Sylvain is a student at the Officers Academy who hails from the Holy Kingdom of Faerghus and is a member of the Blue Lions.
name: Sylvain Jose Gautier

description: Isabella "Ivy" Valentine is a character in the Soul series of fighting games. She appears in every game since Soulcalibur.
name: Isabella 'Ivy' Valentine

description: Edelgard is a playable character and one of the main protagonists in Fire Emblem: Three Houses. She is the princess and the future emperor of the Adrestian Empire. In the Officers Academy, she is the leader of the Black Eagles.
name: Edelgard

description: She is a playable character in the BlazBlue series. Is a former second lieutenant of the World Void Information Control Organization, who was a soldier in the 4th Magic Division, and a member of the Imperial Guards.
name: Noel Vermillion

description: An Arkham Asylum psychiatrist, who begged and eventually convinced her superiors to treat The Joker, Dr. Harleen Quinzel became obsessively fixated on her patient, and believed herself to be in love with him. She helped him escape from confinement and took on her own criminal identity as Harley Quinn.
name: Harley Quinn

description: The Boss was a renowned American soldier, founder, and leader of the Cobra Unit, and mentor and mother figure to Naked Snake.
name: The Boss

description: John Marston is the protagonist of Red Dead Redemption, and a central character in Red Dead Redemption 2. He is also the main protagonist of the non-canon Undead Nightmare expansion pack.
name: John Marston

description: Dutch van der Linde is a recurring character in the Red Dead series, appearing as a central character and one of the primary antagonists of Red Dead Redemption, as well as a central character in Red Dead Redemption 2.
name: Dutch van der Linde

description:
Goro Majima is a recurring major character in the Yakuza series first introduced in the original Yakuza.

His unpredictability, ferocity in combat, and accomplishments as the captain of the Shimano Family earned him the nickname "The Mad Dog of Shimano". He is the former patriarch of the Majima Family, the founder and former president of Majima Construction, and the former vice-chairman of the Tojo Clan.
name: Goro Majima

akas: The Man Who Sold the World
description: Is a renowned special forces operative and mercenary commander. He founded U.S. Army Special Forces Unit FOXHOUND, along with the mercenary company Militaires Sans Frontières, and was one of the founding members of the Patriots. Big Boss later established the military states of Outer Heaven and Zanzibar Land as bases for his companies, in order to realize his ambitions of creating a nation for soldiers. Considered by some as "The Greatest Warrior of the 20th Century," he earned such monikers as "the Legendary Soldier" and "the Legendary Mercenary," feared in combat by both friend and foe as a hero and a madman.
name: Big Boss

description: Mileena is a character in the Mortal Kombat series. A genetic experiment created by the sorcerer Shang Tsung, she is one of the adopted daughters of the Outworld Emperor Shao Kahn and one of his personal enforcers. She has served as an antagonist throughout the series.
name: Mileena

description: Ezio Auditore da Firenze is an Italian assassin and fictional character is in the video game series Assassin's Creed. He serves as the protagonist of the franchise's series of games set in the Italian Renaissance. He appears in Assassin's Creed II, II: Discovery, Brotherhood, and Revelations, as well as the animated short film Embers. He also makes a brief animated appearance in Assassin's Creed III alongside Altaïr Ibn-La'Ahad.
name: Ezio Auditore

description: Molten Freddy is the remains of Ennard, with the consciousness of Funtime Freddy in control, along with Ballora and Funtime Foxy. He first appeared in Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator as one of the four main antagonists.
name: Molten Freddy

description: Zelda is a primary character in The Legend of Zelda series. She's usually portrayed the princess of the Hyrule Kingdom.
name: Zelda

description: Mario Auditore (1434 – 1500) was the leader of the Italian Brotherhood of Assassins from at least 1476 to his death, a condottiero, and the ruler of Monteriggioni from 1454 until his death.
name: Mario Auditore

description:
Good looking, smooth as silk, and silver-tongued, Mike is the resident ladykiller. He's had more girlfriends than he's had hot dinners, which can cause a few problems when a few of them are in his immediate circle of friends...

Mike is a man of action. He's always the first to volunteer, the first to make a suggestion. With a narcissistic streak, there's no denying that he likes the attention that comes with being the man who stands up and can get things done.
name: Michael Munroe

description:
The Big Bad Wolf, or Bigby Wolf as he calls himself in The Wolf Among Us, is the main protagonist and playable character in the game. Long time ago in the Homelands, Bigby was born with a group of seven cubs to Winter Wolf after being courted by the powerful North Wind. He was often teased by his brothers, but loved greatly by his mother until the day she died. When the others went out looking for their father, Bigby stayed to protect the corpse from bounty hunters. At that time, he was too weak to defend anything.

Angered by the loss, he swore vengeance, promising to eat something bigger as each day passed until he became large enough to confront his father. Seven times he tried, and seven times he failed, eventually burying his hatred and grief deep inside his heart. Around that time he became known as "The Big Bad Wolf" of legend. He often terrorized Little Red Riding Hood, attempting to devour her as he was stopped by the Woodsman who cut him open and filled him up with stones. That's also when the two of them became enemies.

After a series of events, Snow White tracks Bigby down and asks him to come to Fabletown. There, he becomes the sheriff with a duty to protect the Fables from mundies (humans) as well as themselves. Many people are still scared of the Wolf because of his past, and has a hard time trusting him. 

As a bit of a loner, however, he tries to prove to everyone day after day that he's not the same person anymore, and that he's capable of being the sheriff that everyone needs.
name: Bigby Wolf

description:
The protagonist is one of the five members of the Literature Club, and the main protagonist of Doki Doki Literature Club!. The protagonist uses whatever name the player gives him, but he is a separate entity from the player.
More specifically, the protagonist is an underachiever, preferring to play video games and watch anime instead of applying himself and having friends. Despite this, when he does interact with others, he tries to be kind and thoughtful.

The protagonist was designed to function like a typical visual novel protagonist. He acts blunt and mean towards Sayori, his childhood friend; teases Natsuki, the tsundere; is warm to Yuri, the shy girl; and falters around Monika, the popular girl. According to Dan Salvato, he is deliberately given very little focus.
name: Protagonist

description:
Monika is one of the five members and President of the Literature Club.
Monika is noted by the other characters to be smart, confident and athletic. She is not as talkative as the other girls, but this is implied to not be through choice. Monika is also known to be quite popular, which causes the protagonist to have an admiration for her. She always has a calm, gentle expression and is portrayed as mature and hard-working.
name: Monika

description:
Natsuki is one of the five members of the Literature Club,
Natsuki appears to be a brash, blunt, cranky, and seemingly arrogant girl at first, with a cute, softer interior as a result of insecurity, convincing Monika enough to class her as the embodiment of a tsundere. While she is impulsive and can speak without thinking, Natsuki truly cares about her friends and, even when she has obvious anger issues, she doesn't enjoy fights or arguments with people. Over the course of the game, it is shown that she worries about Yuri, and, on one occasion, gives the protagonist a note asking him to help Yuri, fearing that if she spoke out then it would cause more arguments. Natsuki is very stubborn and has a hard time expressing how she feels and what she wants. When repeatedly challenged, she often becomes awkward and tongue-tied, then aggressive, and then simply bursts into tears.
name: Natsuki

description:
Yuri is one of the five members of the Literature Club,
Yuri is portrayed throughout the majority of the game as being shy, generous, polite, apologetic, very intelligent, mature, eloquent, and passionate about topics she is interested in, although she is also very insecure, awkward, and has a tendency to act slightly condescending and patronizing to mask her self-doubt. Her façade of passivity and level-headed nature occasionally breaks, however, as Yuri does argue passionately and aggressively with Natsuki over their differing opinions on writing styles. Yuri has a deep desire to be liked by others and is afraid to speak her mind on matters as she believes it will make her seem unlikable. Due to her social ineptitude, she can be innocently insensitive, but once she realizes what she said could be considered rude, she almost immediately apologizes, repeatedly saying she did not mean it. As stated by the protagonist, Yuri likes to think before she says something.
name: Yuri

description:
Sayori is one of the five members of the Literature Club,
Sayori is initially portrayed as the archetype of a Genki Girl, expressing a bubbly and cheery disposition. She is very clumsy, noted for finding ways to accidentally hurt herself or to drop things. Regardless, she is shown to be a jokingly cunning individual who can trick others to get food, shown after managing to eat Natsuki's cookie without her permission. Sayori has also been known to obsess over an activity, only to drop it a few days later, as stated by the protagonist during an interaction between them. This could also be the case with writing poetry, as the protagonist wonders if she might drop it later on, though he also notices that she is a lot more passionate about writing, as she mentions earlier on that it helps her to express and understand her feelings better.
name: Sayori

description:
Triss Merigold of Maribor was a legendary Temerian sorceress of the 13th century. Called Fourteenth of the Hill by her contemporaries because she was erroneously thought to have been killed during the Battle of Sodden Hill, she passed into history as Merigold the Fearless. A member of King Foltest's royal council along with Fercart and Keira Metz, as well as a founding member of the Lodge of Sorceresses, she was involved in politics for most of her life.

She was friends with Yennefer and the witcher Geralt of Rivia, but also unhappily in love with the latter. Triss took care of Ciri at Kaer Morhen for some time and is like an older sister to her. It was through her intervention that Ciri was not subjected to harmful hormone changes at Kaer Morhen, stripping her of her secondary gender traits.

She was a skilled healer and carried with her many magical potions, but she never used them on herself because ironically, she was allergic to potions, and used amulets to treat herself. She was also quite a powerful mage, certainly when it counted most. She wore an amulet - sapphire overlaid with silver.
name: Triss Merigold

description: Ragna the Bloodedge is the main protagonist of the BlazBlue series from Calamity Trigger to Central Fiction. He harbors a deep hatred of the Novus Orbis Librarium and aims to annihilate the organization. In turn, the NOL places the highest-ever bounty in history on his head. Ragna possesses a powerful form of ars magus (magic weapon) called the Azure Grimoire or BlazBlue which is central to the main conflict of the series.
name: Ragna the Bloodedge
